properties.name: embedded.postgresql.init-script-path
properties.description: The SQL file path to execute after the container starts to initialize the database.

values.description: Enables configuration of postgresql server on startup.
Disables configuration of postgresql server on startup.
Latest 10.x alpine version. Ref https://hub.docker.com/_/postgres for further info.
Latest 11.x alpine version. Ref https://hub.docker.com/_/postgres for further info.
Latest 12.x alpine version. Ref https://hub.docker.com/_/postgres for further info.
Latest 9.6 alpine timescaledb version. Ref https://hub.docker.com/r/timescale/timescaledb for further info.
Latest 10.x alpine timescaledb version. Ref https://hub.docker.com/r/timescale/timescaledb for further info.
Latest 11.x alpine timescaledb version. Ref https://hub.docker.com/r/timescale/timescaledb for further info.
It is necessary to do an image pull before the start of the container.
Do not need to do an image pull before the start of the container.
